comments.author: Psychonaut.8792
comments.body:
I’ve searched the forum but couldn’t really find something answering my question. As you all know /v1/events is disabled and /v2/events still returns ‘API not active’.

Can you provide a rough ETA for /v2/events? Or are there no plans to revive it in the near future?
